title: Master SIIC
subject: Intelligent systems and communicants
description: The Master SIIC addresses the problem of designing intelligent systems (real-time and embedded computing, Artificial Intelligence, signal and image processing, networks, telecoms, etc.). This Master emphasizes the problem of integrating all of these components to make a functional system.

title: Master M2I
subject: IT engineering manager
option: Real-time and on-board system, software and systems engineering
description: This work-study in 3 years course, prepares for team management and project management with a digital dimension, by a multidisciplinary approach.

title: BTS IRIS
subject: Higher technician certificate in IT and networks for industry and technical services
description: The BTS in Computer Science and Networks for Industry and Technical Services is a course open to graduates. In 2 years, it trains computer scientists capable of developing and managing computer applications and systems intended for the production of capital goods or technical services.
